CIPHER.365.cipherString: Eat a live frog first thing in the morning and nothing worse will happen to you the rest of the day.
CIPHER.365.question: A quote by Mark Twain has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.365.author: Mark Twain

CIPHER.347.cipherString: Because you are alive, everything is possible.
CIPHER.347.question: The following symbols encode a quote by Thich Nhat Hanh using a Baconian cipher
CIPHER.347.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

CIPHER.358.cipherString: A wise man is he who does not grieve for the things which he has not, but rejoices for those which he has.
CIPHER.358.question: A quote by Epictetus has been encoded using the K2 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.  You are told it contains the word THOSE.
CIPHER.358.author: Epictetus

CIPHER.345.cipherString: When you set your mind to achieve something, you must allow yourself the opportunity to get it done.
CIPHER.345.question: Decode this quote by Tasha Hoggatt which has been encoded using the Caesar Cipher.
CIPHER.345.author: Tasha Hoggatt

CIPHER.361.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 9103756 45108 0842769. What do they decode to?

CIPHER.343.cipherString: It feels awfully nice to be a little kinder to yourself and everybody else.
CIPHER.343.question: The following quote by Sarah Hays Coomer needs to be decoded with the Porta Cipher with a keyword of BLANKET
CIPHER.343.author: Sarah Hays Coomer

CIPHER.349.cipherString: Clear thinking at the wrong moment can stifle creativity.
CIPHER.349.question: Baconian Sequence Quote Author: Karl Lagerfeld
CIPHER.349.author: Karl Lagerfeld

CIPHER.348.cipherString: Failure is when you give up. A real winner is someone that doesn't give up, even when it feels like they are losing.
CIPHER.348.question: A quote by Joshua Hartzell has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.  You are told it contains the word YOU.
CIPHER.348.author: Joshua Hartzell

CIPHER.356.cipherString: Leaders live by choice, not by accident.
CIPHER.356.question: The following strange phrases encode a quote by Mark Gorman using a Baconian cipher. You are told that the cipher text AMAZE FIERY AGING HAIRY COBRA decodes to be BYACC
CIPHER.356.author: Mark Gorman

CIPHER.350.cipherString: You take people, you put them on a journey, you give them peril, you find out who they really are.
CIPHER.350.question: A quote by Joss Whedon has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.  You are told it ends with the word ARE.
CIPHER.350.author: Joss Whedon

CIPHER.355.cipherString: It is useless to attempt to reason a man out of a thing he was never reasoned into.
CIPHER.355.question: The following quote by Swift needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitution Cipher with a keyword of STORE and polybius key of GASOLINE.
CIPHER.355.author: Swift

CIPHER.362.cipherString: I prefer to think of myself as a musician who is still learning and trying to do something every time out.
CIPHER.362.question: A quote by Geddy Lee has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.  You are told it contains the word EVERY.
CIPHER.362.author: Geddy Lee

CIPHER.344.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 53761 5478 89372 03471. What do they decode to?

CIPHER.360.cipherString: wee mussed knot taek hte faults of hour oyuth into our lod age; for old age brings with it it's own defects.
CIPHER.360.question: Decode a quote by Goethe that was encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher.  Unfortunately the message was received over a bad connection, so there are some errors in it.
CIPHER.360.author: Goethe

CIPHER.342.cipherString: Failures are with heroic minds the stepping-stones to success.
CIPHER.342.question: A quote by Haliburton has been encoded using the Complete Columnar Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote has ONESTO somewhere in it.
CIPHER.342.author: Haliburton

CIPHER.363.cipherString: When you encounter difficulties and contradictions, do not try to break them, but bend them with gentleness and time.
CIPHER.363.question: A quote by Saint Francis de Sales has been encoded using the K2 Patristocrat Cipher for you to decode.  You are told it starts with WHEN Y.
CIPHER.363.author: Saint Francis de Sales

CIPHER.357.cipherString: Love the giver more than the gift.
CIPHER.357.question: The following quote by Brigham Young needs to be decoded with the Affine Cipher where a=9 and b=13.
CIPHER.357.author: Brigham Young

CIPHER.354.cipherString: An expert is an ordinary person who consistently sought knowledge in a specific field and applied it.
CIPHER.354.question: A quote by Gift Gugu Mona has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.354.author: Gift Gugu Mona

CIPHER.351.cipherString: The simple and familiar hold the secrets of the complex and unknown.
CIPHER.351.question: Decode this quote by Edward B. Burger which has been encoded using the Atbash Cipher.
CIPHER.351.author: Edward B. Burger

CIPHER.364.cipherString: Un sue√±o no se hace realidad por arte de magia, necesita sudor, determinaci√≥n y trabajo duro.
CIPHER.364.question: A quote by Colin Powell in Spanish has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. It has been encoded using a K1 alphabet using an English keyword.
CIPHER.364.author: Colin Powell
CIPHER.364.translation: A dream doesn't come true by magic, it takes sweat, determination and hard work.

CIPHER.359.cipherString: Be content with your uniqueness in this world and live a life of happiness.
CIPHER.359.question: The following quote by Gift Gugu Mona needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitution Cipher with a keyword of LEARN and polybius key of VANDERBILT.
CIPHER.359.author: Gift Gugu Mona

CIPHER.346.cipherString: Identifying your core values and goals is an incredibly important step on the road to achieving success.
CIPHER.346.question: A quote by Felecia Etienne has been encoded using the Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.346.author: Felecia Etienne

CIPHER.353.cipherString: Life is a canvas. Paint it with colors that bring you joy.

CIPHER.352.cipherString: It never seems to occur to some people, that, like beauty, a sense of humor may sometimes be fatal.
CIPHER.352.question: A quote by Edgar Rice Burroghs has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.352.author: Edgar Rice Burroghs
